column2: BRIEF-Hilltopsecurities Appoints David Rhodes Chief Information Officer May 1 (Reuters) - Hilltop Holdings Inc: * INFORMATION TECHNOLOGY MANAGING DIRECTOR DAVID RHODES HAS BEEN NAMED FIRM’S NEW CHIEF INFORMATION OFFICER * RHODES IS REPLACING HTS’ PREVIOUS CIO, JEFF HAMMILL Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
